text: Ee Toktamış Efendi, köpeksiz obada değneksiz gezersin ha.
english: Well, Mr. Toktamış, you're walking around without a stick in a village without dogs, huh? He who falls on his
I don't want (Çolpan) at my table.

text: Vıcık vıcık bir aşın beyimizin sofrasında yeri yoktur.
english: A soggy dish has no place on our lord's table.
Ashur is enough to go with the meat.

text: Her vakit olduğu gibi mükellef bir ziyafet hazırlamışsın.
english: As always, you've prepared a magnificent feast. Our lords, who

text: Obamızın yükünü sırtlanan beylerimiz her daim...
english: bear the burden of our tribe, always
How many rugs do we have left, Vural? There's enough for
the Venetians, sir. Are there any with

text: Rengi tutmayan, dokuması kötü olan var mı Çolpan?
english: mismatched colors or poor weaving, Çolpan?
I didn't like a few of them, Dad.
The women will work through the night to get it ready by tomorrow.
You did very well, my daughter. I do

text: Çavdarların noksan mal teslim ettiğini kimseden duymak istemem.
english: n't want to hear from anyone that the rye suppliers delivered short quantities.

text: Bu sefer düşman topyekûn saldırıya geçecek.
english: This time the enemy will launch an all-out attack.
Therefore, we have no time to lose. We

text: Bir kale gibi set olmalıyız onlara.
english: must be like a fortress, a barrier against them.
...the pot is about to boil in the village.
The people have reached their breaking point. May

text: Nankörlüğün de gözü kör olsun beyim.
Doyarken ses yok, aç kalınca böğürtüler başlıyor.
english: There's no sound when they're full, but the bellowing starts when they get hungry.

text: Kaç senedir iyi bile dayandılar gardaş.
english: They've held out pretty well for all these years, brother. The substantial

text: Yapacağımız yüklü miktarda bir ticaret ahaliye umut olacaktır beyim.
english: trade we're about to undertake will bring hope to the people, sir. I learned that
the Venetians will be coming to buy carpets .

text: Tez vakitte obadaki bütün kilimler toplansın.
english: All the rugs in the village should be collected as soon as possible.

text: Abdurrahman, Dündar, biz dönene kadar bu vazife sizindir.
english: Abdurrahman, Dündar, this duty is yours until we return.

text: Beyim, müsaade edersen obadaki tüm beyleri ziyaret etmek isterim.
english: My lord, if you will allow me, I would like to visit all the lords in the tribe. They shouldn't be upset
that we didn't have a wedding.
You've thought this through well, Mr. Artuk.
My lord, what if the valiant Sultan dies...

text: ...ya peşine düşeceğimiz adamın kim olduğunu öğrenemezsek?
english: ...what if we never find out who the man we're supposed to be pursuing is? We have no choice but to get

text: Onu o pazardan canlı ya da ölü çıkarmaktan...
english: him out of that market, dead or alive,

text: O kocaman pazardan Sultan Alaeddin'in casusunu çıkartmak çok zordur beyim.
english: Sultan Alaeddin's spy out of that huge market is very difficult, sir.
How are you going to do it? Do you know how

text: ...avlarını pusuya nasıl çekerler bilir misin Dündar'ım?
english: ...lure their prey into ambush, Dündar? Then

text: Sultan Alaeddin'in bu topraklarda vazifelendirdiği casusu yakalayacağız.
english: We'll capture the spy Sultan Alaeddin has assigned to this land. I used the

text: Büyük balığı yakalamak için sünnetli şövalyeyi yem yaptım.
english: circumcised knight as bait to catch the big fish. Will
Master Simon fall into our trap? It

text: Ona tuzak kurduğumu bilecek kadar zeki bir adam olduğunu tahmin ediyorum.
english: I suspect he's a smart enough man to know I've set a trap for him.
There's a trap, inside the trap.

text: Her ne pahasına olursa olsun onu canlı ele geçireceğiz.
english: We will capture him alive, no matter the cost. May
Ertuğrul Bey, is there permission? Here
Sir, if you'll allow me, I have a few things to say. Go ahead,
My lord, I beg your forgiveness.
I said things you won't like. I was caught off guard while getting angry at the

text: Oba hatunlarının ettiği sözlere kızarken ben gaflete düştüm.

english: I acted like them. Please excuse my mistake
These lands are surrounded by fire, Halime.
we take refuge in Allah like Abraham...

text: ...o ateş bize gül bahçesi gibi görünecektir.
english: ...that fire will appear to us like a rose garden .

text: Bize, hepimize düşen Allah'a tevekkül etmektir.
english: Our duty, the duty of all of us, is to put our trust in God. With
God on my side, there's nothing to worry about. With
God on my side, there's nothing to worry about, Halime. We
I know you carry a heavy burden too.

text: Bu yük söyletmiştir sana bu sözleri, bilirim.
english: This burden has made you say these words, I know.

text: Bu gece Alplerle birlikte ava gideceğiz.
english: We're going hunting with the Alps tonight. With

text: Allah'ın da yardımıyla bereketli bir av olacak inşallah.
english: God's help, it will hopefully be a fruitful hunt.
your arrow not miss its target, and may your prey not escape. May

text: Sonunda kurt da olduk ya, korkulur bizden vallahi.
english: Now that we've become wolves, we're truly to be feared.

text: Bakalım onlar karşımıza hangi kılıkta çıkacak?
english: Let's see what disguises they'll show up in!

text: Ya gardaş, hiç kimse asil bir kurt gibi olmaz gardaş.
english: Brother, nobody is like a noble wolf, brother. Wow, it really suits you!

text: Ee, yiğide ne giyse yakışır Bamsı Beyrek.
english: Well, Bamsı Beyrek, a brave man looks good in anything he wears . Yes,

text: Avratsız yiğit mi olurmuş Bamsı Beyrek?
english: man be brave without a wife, Bamsi Beyrek?

text: ...gardaş seni gardaş, seni tüysüz bırakırım ben gardaş.
english: ...brother, I'll leave you all bare, brother.
I'll leave you completely hairless, bro.

text: Turgut alpbaşım bu atlarda terbiye kalmamıştır.
english: Turgut, my lord, these horses have lost all discipline. They
don't know how to talk to their elders.
(All at once) Peace be upon you, sir. Here
you go sir, your mail is ready.
...the campaign is ours, the victory is God's.
I see you're distracted, my daughter. What's

text: Bugün ölecek yaşlı bir köleyi kurtardı baba.
english: father saved an old slave who was about to die today.

text: Hem de zor durumdaki obasının ekmeğinden keserek yaptı bunu.
english: And he did it by cutting back on the bread of his struggling tribe.
What would you like to say, my daughter? I often wonder when

text: Biz ne vakittir içimizdeki merhameti kaybettik diye düşünürüm.
english: we lost the compassion within ourselves . Did
you find the answer, Aslıhan Hatun?

text: Ne vakit yiğitliğin değil, altının peşine düştük...
english: The moment we started chasing after gold instead of bravery ...
...that's the day we lost. What was it you

text: Bizimle konuşmak istediğin mesele neydi baba?
english: wanted to talk to us about, Dad?
doesn't deserve this treatment. I have some
things to take care of, Mr. Ural.
With your permission. Because of the

text: Bugün bana yaşattığın o utanç verici mesele yüzünden...
english: embarrassing incident you put me through today...
I felt it necessary to take certain precautions. Do

text: Hâlâ bir kansızın dediklerine mi inanırsın?
english: you still believe what a heartless person says?

text: Sen ne diyeceğimi gayet iyi bilirsin Ural.
english: You know perfectly well what I'm going to say, Ural.
Now I'll tell you things you already know.
